entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then northwest 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount possibly more than 15 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
